DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate efficacy safety ONO-1101 postoperative supraventricular tachyarrhythmias .
DOC.brief_title: Controlled Study ONO-1101 Patients With Postoperative Tachyarrhythmias Japan
DOC.criteria: 1 . 20 year old 2 . Postoperative supraventricular tachyarrhythmias 3 . Within 7 day postoperatively 4 . Other inclusion criterion specify protocol 1 . Acute myocardial infarction ( within 1 month onset ) 2 . Severe heart failure [ New York Heart Association ( NYHA ) functional class III high ] 3 . Atrioventricular block ( grade II high ) , sick sinus syndrome 4 . Other exclusion criterion specify protocol
